headline: Advanced Micro Devices, Robinhood, 23andMe: Market Minute
summary: Wealth host Brad Smith goes over some of the trading day's top stories on this segment of Market Minute. Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) stock is under pressure after the company was downgraded by Jefferies, citing AMD's difficulty keeping up with Nvidia (NVDA). Robinhood (HOOD) introduces new banking services and wealth management services for customers. 23andMe (ME) skyrockets after receiving approval to sell customer data in its bankruptcy proceedings. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.
